summary: This is a very simple graphical enhancing file that will surely improve your fps on even a toaster, but keep in mind that this will destroy the visuals in the game to make the game run that much better.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple graphical enhancing file that will surely improve your fps on even a toaster, but keep in mind that this will destroy the visuals in the game to make the game run that much better.

[size=4][b][u]Installation

[/u][/b][/size]Step 1: MANUALLY download the file to somewhere accessible

Step 2: extract the contents toÂ C:\Users\(Username)*\Documents\My Games\Skyrim

Step 3: Copy And Replace Everything (Make sure to create a back-up of your ini's first!)

Step 4: Launch Skyrim through SKSE, SKSE isn't required but is recommended so you don't end up opening the launcher. (it will revert all changes if you use the launcher)

and your home free to play!

*note: if the game doesn't start properly, go into your skyrimprefs.ini and change the iSize resolution, because the resolution preset in this file works with only certain monitors


*this is your computer accounts username for those who don't know
author: Drakeleth
